name: IndianGKQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open indian g. k. quiz”
”my stats”
”set a reminder”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian g. k. quiz
des:
1. About the game:-

These are people whom Indian GK will face quiz questions related to Indian General knowledge. It is the best option that helps you to learn about Indian knowledge and test your knowledge about Indian G. K.
It will prompt a welcome message in which it will ask you 5 multiple-choice questions about Indian G. K. on each day of the game and also help you that how can play the game.
The most important thing is you need to give an answer in numbers from 1 to 4 (one, two, three, four).
Now you also listen to an Indian fact-related question.

2. Features:-
interactive sounds available for better engagement of customers.
Users also can enjoy this game on Alexa display-supported devices.
Collections of wanted and most popular questions definitely interact with you to play one or more times.
Reminder added.
Improved visual experience added.
GUI card (Alexa app)
listen to a fact after every question.
Save progress help you start where you left off.

3. How to play.
 Just say, Alexa, open Indian g. k. quiz (for starting the game) 
 you also can follow the example phrase as well. 
here you will interact with the leaderboard as well. (if available)
for the reminder, you can say, (reminder, set a reminder, etc.)

4. shopping actions:-
 This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.

5. Game stats:-
 now users are able to check their stats playing.
 In this way it includes total score, total answered questions, wrong answers, correct answers, and skipped answers. 
On the basis of correct answers, it evaluates your final percentage.
Just say my stats or results etc.

 6. Reach us 
 If you have any queries or suggestions about the game, you can reach us at info@akskills.com 
 Thanks in advance for giving your support to us.

Note: for reminder setup, you need to give reminder permission in your Alexa app. You also can edit reminders after the successful creation of reminders in your Alexa app.
Leaderboard Availability depends on ongoing competition. If no competitions, then you listen only msg.
 This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
